item.title: ▶️ 'Huitzilopochtli' Painting Timelapse Video
item.description: Our story begins with Coatlique, the earth goddess, mother to Coyolxanuhqui, goddess of the moon and to her male children, the gods of the stars. While upon Serpent Mountain she finds a ball of feathers and tucks it in her bosom. She looks for it later, but finds it missing. Coatlique realises she is pregnant and begins to tell her children the story of what had happened, but they do not believe her.

item.title: 'Huitzilopochtli' | A Story of Wrath, Retribution & Triumph..
item.description: Our story begins with Coatlique, the earth goddess, mother to Coyolxanuhqui, goddess of the moon and to her male children, the gods of the stars. While upon Serpent Mountain she finds a ball of feathers and tucks it in her bosom. She looks for it later, but finds it missing. Coatlique realises she is pregnant and begins to tell her children the story of what had happened, but they do not believe her.

item.title: ▶️ 'IKAROA' | Ultraviolet Silkscreen Printing Video
item.description: I K A R O A - Two colour ultraviolet silkscreen print. Taking its name from the Maori word for ‘the long fish that gave birth to all the stars in the Milky Way’ depicts a carp, bringing together Japanese and Maori culture within a retro framework. Tune by: Chaos In The CBD - Dusty Sundays

item.title: ▶️ 'Tiger Lair' | Ultraviolet Mural Video
item.description: Travel to a realm of enlightenment inspired by ancient Korean mythology. A tiger undergoes a spiritual journey shifting through layers of enlightenment on his path to becoming human. Along the way he encounters shrines, temples and mediation gardens inhabited by Buddha & Yama (The Lord of Hell). Tune: Delirous - BCee, Kimyan Law

item.title: ▶️ 'WINTER' Tiger Lair Part 4 | Ultraviolet Mural Video
item.description: Travel to a realm of enlightenment inspired by ancient Korean mythology. A tiger undergoes a spiritual journey shifting through layers of enlightenment on his path to becoming human. Along the way he encounters shrines, temples and mediation gardens inhabited by Buddha & Yama (The Lord of Hell). Tune: Disillusion - Gerra & Stone
